function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pathogen dispersal through respiratory droplets during talking, coughing, and sneezing","Impact":"Increased spread of airborne pathogens in occupied places","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, use of masks, and respiratory hygiene practices","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UVGI (Ultraviolet Germicidal Irradiation) systems, and HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters","People":"Occupants of built environments, particularly in crowded or poorly-ventilated spaces","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Contamination of respiratory droplets with deep lung pathogens during coughing","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of deep lung pathogens","Mitigation":"Use of respiratory masks, cough etiquette, and avoidance of close contact","Technologies":"Respiratory masks, cough etiquette education, and physical barriers","People":"Individuals with deep lung pathogens, healthcare workers, close contacts of infected individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Airborne transmission of influenza A virus and other respiratory diseases","Impact":"Risk of airborne transmission and penetration of lower lung regions","Mitigation":"Enhanced respiratory protection, vaccination, and use of air filtration systems","Technologies":"Respiratory protective equipment, vaccines, and high-efficiency air filters","People":"Occupants of built environments, healthcare workers, susceptible individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"}]}
